panels.content:
![logo image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marinebon/mbon-dashboard-server/client-fgbnms/static_files/FGB_DBv2_logos_banner2.png)

### NEW: A real-time Sofar Buoy is now installed at East Flower Garden Bank. Please click [HERE](https://spotters.sofarocean.com/?spotter-filter=SPOT-30987C) to access data.

 


#### Directions for site navigation:

Select location(s) for satellite time series extraction using the "Satellite Time Series Extraction Locations" menu at left.

Select display mean, climatology, or anomalies of extracted satellite data using the "Time Series Metric" menu at left.

The range of the displayed time period can be adjusted at top right.

Scroll down to see all image and time series data panels.
To show or hide a panel, simply click on the panel title.

#### Locations of extracted data:
* A: Stetson Bank
* B: West Flower Garden Bank
* C: Horseshoe Bank
* D: East Flower Garden Bank
* E: MacNeil Bank
* F: Rankin/28 Fathom Bank
* G: Bright Bank
* H: Geyer Bank
* I: Elvers Bank
* J: McGrail Bank
* K: Bouma Bank
* L: Rezak Bank
* M: Sidner Bank
* N: Parker Bank
* O: Alderice Bank
* P: Sonnier Bank
* COAST 1-4: Coastal Regions of Interest
* SS 1-8: Sentinel Sites
panels.title: Welcome to the Flower Garden Banks data dashboard

panels.description:
MODIS-Aqua 1km chlor_a product (mg/m^3) binned to 7-day intervals.
Anomaly images created by subtracting 7-day climatologies made using data from 2003-2019.
panels.title: MODIS-Aqua CHLa 7-Day anomaly images (mg/m^3)

panels.description:
VIIRS-SNPP 1km nighttime SST product (DegC) binned to 7-day intervals.
Anomaly images created by subtracting 7-day climatologies made using data from 2013-2019.
panels.title: VIIRS-SNPP 7-Day nightime SST anomaly images (DegC)

panels.description:
MODIS-Aqua 1km Rrs_667 (sr^-1) binned to 7-day intervals.
This product is a proxy for suspended sediments in surface waters.
Anomaly images created by subtracting 7-day climatologies made using data from 2003-2019.
panels.title: MODIS-Aqua remote sensing reflectance at 667nm (susp. sediment proxy) 7-Day anomaly images (sr^-1)

panels.description:
MODIS-Aqua 1km Algal Bloom Index (ABI) product (W m^2 um^-1 sr^-1) binned to 7-day intervals. ABI is based on normalized fluorescent line height and is normalized by green reflectance to account for suspended sediments. 
Anomaly images created by subtracting 7-day climatologies made using data from 2003-2019.
panels.title: MODIS-Aqua ABI (Algal Bloom Index) 7-Day anomaly images (W/m^2/um/sr)

panels.description:
MODIS-Aqua 1km Algal Bloom Index (ABI) product (W m^2 um^-1 sr^-1) binned to 7-day intervals. ABI is based on normalized fluorescent line height and is normalized by green reflectance to account for suspended sediments. 
Anomaly images created by subtracting 7-day climatologies made using data from 2003-2019.
panels.title: Dynamic biogeographic seascapes (class)

targets.query:
SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS anomaly FROM "moda_chlor_a"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS anomaly FROM "moda_sst4"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS anomaly FROM "moda_Rrs_667"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS anomaly FROM "moda_ABI"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

SELECT mean(/^$metric$/)  FROM "river_discharge"
WHERE ("location" = 'FGBdb_TX') AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

panels.title: Discharge from Texas rivers $metric (combined discharge from guages shown as  green circles on map)

targets.query:
SELECT mean(/^$metric$/)  FROM "river_discharge"
WHERE ("location" = 'FGBdb_MS') AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

panels.title: Discharge from Mississippi River $metric (discharge from guage shown by red circle on map)

targets.query:
SELECT value  FROM "sofar_bouy"
GROUP BY "spotter_id" fill(null)

panels.content:
* Satellite data is from the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS-Aqua) sensor and is obtained from the [Ocean Biology Processing Group](https://oceancolor.gsfc.nasa.gov/) at NASA's Goddard Space Flight Center.

* Algal Bloom Index (ABI) is calculated using the method of Hu and Feng (2016; doi: 10.1117/1.JRS.11.012003) 

* River discharge data is obtained from the [USGS National Water Information System](https://waterdata.usgs.gov/nwis). Discharge values from the Colorado, Brazos, Trinity, Neches and Sabine Rivers (green circles on map above) are summed for discharge into the northwest Gulf of Mexico and plotted above. Discharge data from the Mississippi River (yellow circle on map above) is also plotted.

* Dynamic seascapes are classified using multivariate satellite data and describe basin and gyre scale features and seasonal boundary shifts. They are obtained from [NOAA's Coastwatch](https://cwcgom.aoml.noaa.gov/erddap/griddap/noaa_aoml_seascapes_8day.graph). A description of seascape classes can be found [HERE](https://shiny.marinebon.app/seascapes/classes.html).

Please feel free to contact us with questions or to sign up for email alerts:

Dr. Daniel Otis - [dotis@usf.edu](mailto:dotis@usf.edu)
panels.title: Data Sources and Contact Information
